question: South Bronx United, which was seen in news recently, is an organisation associated with which field?
explanation:
New York- based Social service organisation ‘South Bronx United’ was seen in news recently, as it was announced as the recipient of the 2020 Laureus Sport for Good Award.
It is a programme, which uses ‘Football’ as a tool of social transformation, to change the lives of youth from marginalized communities in New York. Famous Rugby Player Bryan Habana was inducted Into Laureus World Sports Academy.
